**Product Information Cards**

Updates to the pack have been finalized and as soon as we finish all the product cards you will have the best new version of Chaka ever!

**Edited <time datetime="2017-09-01T05:29:40Z" title="09/01/2017 05:29  AM" data-short="6 yr">September 1, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

**Chaka @ <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>** **** 

To prepare for his visit to the space center, Chaka gets his first bath in 8 years

![IMG_1874.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/nycgG5/IMG_1874.jpg)

**In other news, SLS - Orion Munar Mission and other SLS expanded systems now have foam insulation all the way to the service module:**

![sls_orange.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/iB3Dw5/sls_orange.jpg)

![screenshot715.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/hPSv9Q/screenshot715.jpg)

![Chaka.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/bGKgik/Chaka.jpg)

Actually, it's the other way around, Chaka is covered in TPS foam for his own safety

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-06T21:27:45Z" title="10/06/2017 09:27  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 6, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

**Chaka October Open House Special**

**Effective immediately, this forum space is open for you to post screenshots of your best Chaka missions. At the end of October, the best screenshots post will earn a prize: an official Chaka Monkey T-shirt in your size of choice!**

![cts.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/gO4wrk/cts.jpg)

***Happy posting!***
![PsSjqDX.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/PsSjqDX.jpg)

Hi!

Thank you for your great mod!

Unfortunately, I have a problem.

All my vessels where the Orion capsule is used, my Kerbals are invisible and I can't get inside: (  

I don't have that problem on other modules.

> > > 9 hours ago, davidewei said: > > > same problem, I think he did not finish the inside of the orion capsule module yet. > Confirmed, the new Orion IVA file was missing from the zip. Update shortly. **► Chaka Monkey Evolution ◄** **- Fewer parts, less complicated, more exploration, more evolved -** ![xB3zgx.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img633/5101/xB3zgx.jpg) **[► Chaka 1.3.1 X Spacedock Link ◄](https://spacedock.info/mod/599/Chaka%20Monkey%20Exploration%20Systems/download/Chaka_Monkey_Evolution_1.3.1_X)** **[Click here to "Get Monkey"](https://youtu.be/k5M9N8ibvlQ)** ![Product_copy.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/fRek2Q/Product_copy.jpg) **1.3.1 Change log:** Orion Pod IVA fixed!! **Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.** **♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.** **♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.** **♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData** **♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships** **♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)** **♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!** **Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products commissioned or licensed from the following authors:** **Winston & Kickasskyle - KW Rocketry** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Alexustas - A.L.C.O.R. Pod** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/) **Alexustas - ASET IVA for Monkey Rover and Mk1-2 Pod** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/) **Bobcat, Ind. American Pack - all rights reserved and belong to BobCat, expressed written permission from Bobcat for American Pack components to be distributed with Chaka** **Tiberion - NovaPunch** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau - all rights reserved, expressed written permission from Normak and CardBoardBoxProcessor for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Lionhead Aerospace** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Sumghai - SDHI Service Module System** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Alexey Volynskov (Keramzit Procedural Fairings)** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **BahamutoD - RS-68 Engine - All rights reserved - expressed written permission from BahamutoD for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Sumghai / Fustek / Nothke - Habitats** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **LandeTLS - SLS Block I fairings** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **TALISAR - Talisar Large Upper Stage** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Porkjet - Habitat IVAs -** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **and expressed written permission from Porkjet for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Blackheart612 - Aerojet Kerbodyne** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/) **expressed written permission from Blackheart612 for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Kommitz - Chaka Nuclear Thermal Engines** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Nertea - Octo-Girder Argon Segment** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **NoOneSpecial - NOS Altair pod and lander** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Hanson Ma / xxhansonmaxx - CST-100 Parachute, Dock Port, and CST-100 pod IVA** [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **CXG2827 - CXaerospace Station Parts -** **All Rights Reserved** **** **(Models and Textures are permitted for modification and distribution by YANFRET in Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems)** **Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent.** **Also, Chaka wishes to thank our awesome 1.3 beta test team: [@Space Kadet](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/166557-space-kadet/) , [@OV-102](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165002-ov-102/), [@Jarlgnarök](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175241-jarlgnar%C3%B6k/), [@davidewei](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/168202-davidewei/) , and of course [@MeCripp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/96203-mecripp/) for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible.** ![qdWsO8.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/2193/qdWsO8.jpg) **Special thanks to [@rsparkyc](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/141917-rsparkyc/)** **for updating Procedural Fairings to 1.3!** **Monkey Rover Wheels provided by:** **![joXUlV.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/3272/joXUlV.jpg)** **BMW, AG** **Chaka the monkey supports using Raster Prop Monitor by [@MOARdV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/60950-moardv/)** **LICENSE** **Unless otherwise specified, all materials available for download on this page are copyrighted and released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 License. [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)** **Included plugin licenses:** **Kerbal Joint Reinforcement** is licensed to be distributed only with Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems on express written permission from Ferram4 due to specific critical requirements. Distribution of Kerbal Joint Reinforcement from this download is expressly prohibited: KJR License is GNU GPL v3 [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html) For the latest version and updates to KJR, please visit [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15) **KSPAPIEXTENSIONS** is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81496-1-0-2-KSPAPIExtensions-V1-7-4-Utilities-for-shared-mod-use-1-May](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81496-1-0-2-KSPAPIExtensions-V1-7-4-Utilities-for-shared-mod-use-1-May) [CC BY terms (attribution)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) **Procedural Fairings** is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-25-Procedural-Fairings-3-10-payload-auto-struts-%28October-11%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-25-Procedural-Fairings-3-10-payload-auto-struts-%28October-11%29) [CC BY terms (attribution)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) **Animated Decouplers** ( Starwaster ) is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0) [https://github.com/Starwaster/AnimatedDecouplers](https://github.com/Starwaster/AnimatedDecouplers) [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Edited October 6, 2017 by YANFRET**

anyone else having the station solar panels unfolding before launch? even in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> the massive solar arrays unfold and I can't get them back in ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")  

pretty funky issue.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, dresoccer4 said:
> 
> 
> anyone else having the station solar panels unfolding before launch? even in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> the massive solar arrays unfold and I can't get them back in ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")  
> 
> pretty funky issue.
> 

Have never seen that, and just did a cross check with a clean install and they are nominal. Also those panels use a really standard animation

MODULE  

    {  

        name = ModuleDeployableSolarPanel  

        animationName = Default Take  

        raycastTransformName = Suncatcher  

        pivotName = boxes  

        resourceName = ElectricCharge  

        chargeRate = 60  

    }

So you might have something else going on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") 

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-07T15:34:48Z" title="10/07/2017 03:34  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 7, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

With a new KSP version, and the update complete, there's now an opportunity to build a fresh save game and run a play through of the entire Chaka pack. So, let's get started!

**Monkey Station One** 

**AMLV - Cupola Exploration Module**

**AMLV - Exploration Habitat**

**AMLV - Station Module**

940 Km orbit, using surpuls upper from each launch to boost as modules are added.

![nD5iG9n.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/nD5iG9n.jpg)
Is there a link where I can download an older version of CMES for KSP 1.2.2, I want to use it with Realism Overhaul.
